description: Explore the complex legal challenges and considerations surrounding NFTs and copyright, including ownership, licensing agreements, jurisdictional issues, and more. Gain insights into how these unique digital assets are reshaping the legal landscape for creators and collectors.
keywords: NFTs, copyright, legal challenges, digital assets, ownership, smart contracts, unauthorized minting, fair use, jurisdictional issues, moral rights, collective management organizations
title: Navigating the Murky Waters of NFTs and Copyright: Legal Challenges and Considerations
